author: mturyn
msg: 1.) Added functionality for the new "simpleDocumentDataSource" tag.
2.) Added hooks for a "uri" attribute to javascriptDatasource, so that we don't have to include code for objects in the html (just request them from the class).
3.) General fixing up a nd improvement of exception handling, which still could be much better---still using xap.util.Excpetion a lot.
